goal: Compare prices of the same Uniqlo HEATTECH women's crew-neck long-sleeve top across Uniqlo Korea, Coupang, Naver Shopping, and Amazon
context:
High-level Goal: Compare prices of the same Uniqlo HEATTECH women's crew-neck long-sleeve top across Uniqlo Korea, Coupang, Naver Shopping, and Amazon
Comparison Target: Uniqlo HEATTECH Women's Crew Neck Long Sleeve Top (기본 히트텍 여성 라운드넥 긴팔)
Compare by: price

Comparison info gathered so far:
  - www.uniqlo.com: 24,900원

final_comparison.reasoning: Among the gathered results only one price was provided (Uniqlo Korea: 24,900원). Because price is the sole comparison criterion and no other site prices were supplied, the Uniqlo Korea listing is the best option by default (it is the lowest/only known price). To produce a fuller, definitive ranking, collect the current prices for the same item from Coupang, Naver Shopping, and Amazon (including shipping and seller fees) and re-run the comparison.
